contentList.content:
You gain a +5 bonus to Initiative and can't be Surprised.

During you first turn in combat, you have an amount of temporary hit points equal to your current level, and you have Freedom of Movement.
You gain a +[1] bonus to Initiative and can't be <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SURPRISED">Surprised</LSTag>.
During you first turn in combat, you have an amount of temporary hit points equal to your current level, and you have <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FREEDOM_OF_MOVEMENT">Freedom of Movement</LSTag>.
You have temporary hit points equal to your current level.
